Also they should be able to exchange few messages , not like chat but simply message to arrange the deal.Lookinf for a skilled developer who can make such application. All the details about the design and logic i will provide. Application should be easily scalable, and built in such a way so it provides transparent updates and new relesase automatialy for customers. Also should be built for a high number of customers so performance should be well. Looking for rough estimation in time and cost.Thank you all and whish good luck.

desc: Looking for a mobile programmer to have a good knowledge on windows server 2012 R2 networks to create a VPN application similar to Supervpn.[url removed, login to view]Application Summary:This is a FREE vpn application, Users download it from Google play store. The app let the users to change their IP address and browse web and internet. The user device internet will go through VPN server.You need to create the client side application and set up the server so the users can connect to VPN server. The server is Windows Server 2012 R2.You need to optimize it so the most possible people can connect to server on a fair speed.A control panel to check the clients is required.There are many protocols and technology and third party software for this cause.We need to discuss what technology, port, method or third party softwares you are planning to use. It should not violate the Third party companies right in any way.Application Features ( may change base on our conversation )Attractive user interface.User click on Connect button and connect to VPN.an Ad will be display below connect, disconnect button. ( similar to superVPN)App should run on a wide array of android devices.Multi servers support.Adding bandwidth limit for users or disabling the limit and making it unlimitedLimiting the ability to send emails to avoid Spam and abuse of VPN.-----------------When designing the application consider the following that in future I will need you to design new features and upgrade for this app.such as paid members using faster servers, or be able to change their IP to servers in Europe or Asia. at this moment the servers are in US.In future the app will be available for IOS devices as wellIts recommended for you to install superVPN application from Google play store so you will have a better and more clear idea in regards to this software.[url removed, login to view]I keep long term relationship with my programmers, all updates, features and upgrade of software will be assign to you. See this project as a long term partnership not a one-time  work.Please note that we can use other Server OS for vpn servers such as CentOS so using Windows is not a must, It would actually be cheaper for me too.Answer Following Questions:1. Have you setup VPN on windows servers in past? If yes, Please tell me what protocol did you use.2. Have you made mobile app? If yes, Please "ONLY" include the Google play store URL and your title in project.
title: Make a VPN application similar to SuperVPN (ANDROID)

desc: I need a responsive website.  I would like it designed and built.  We   are   looking   for   SW developers who   can   help   build   to   this   concept   & requirements   identified   below.The   product   would   involve   a   mobile   client,   web   based   portal   and   backend   server   in   a   publiccloud   infrastructure. Key   Components● iOS   Application   -   OK   with   Hybrid   apps● Android   Application   -   OK   with   Hybrid   apps● Web   Portal   with   limited   functionalities● Backend   code   running   in   AWS   or   Azure   infrastructureKey   Features   and   use   cases● Ability   to   create   users   (login   and   account)   using   the   application● Ability   to   record   3-5   minutes   videos   using   the   mobile   application● Ability   to   upload   the   recorded   video   or   stored   video   on   phone   to   backend   server● Ability   to   group   users   based   on   business   logic● Ability   to   group   videos   uploaded   by   users● Ability   to   vote   for   videos   using   the   application● Ability   to   restrict   number   of   videos   the   users   can   upload   in   a   time   duration● Ability   to   restrict   how   many   votes   can   be   applied   on   a   group   of   videos   by   a   user● Ability   to   view/stream   videos   on   the   mobile   application
